Address.value: 1331 L STREET, NORTHWEST, Washington, 20005, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CoStar Group is a leading provider of commercial real estate data and marketplace listing platforms. Its data offering contains in-depth analytical information on over 5 million commercial real estate properties related to various subsectors including office, retail, multifamily, healthcare, industrial, self-storage, and data centers. It operates many flagship brands such as CoStar Suite, LoopNet, Apartments.com, BizBuySell, LandsofAmerica, and so on with more than 75% of its revenue classified as subscription-based. The company has also recently expanded its presence in Canada, the United Kingdom, Spain, and France.
